mapper.insert:
insert into user_sign_record (
id,
org_code,
war_zone_code,
war_zone_name,
site_code,
user_code, user_code_encrypt, user_code_index,
user_name, user_name_encrypt, user_name_index,
wave_code,
job_code,
sign_date,
sign_in_time,
sign_out_time,
ref_plan_key,
ref_grid_key,
ref_station_key,
create_user,
create_user_name,
update_user,
update_user_name,
create_time,
update_time,
yn,
ts,
mode_type,
) values (
#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{orgCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{warZoneCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{warZoneName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{siteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{userCode, typeHandler=com.jd.security.aces.mybatis.handle.AcesPlainTextHandle}, #{userCode, typeHandler=com.jd.security.aces.mybatis.handle.AcesCipherTextHandle}, #{userCode, typeHandler=com.jd.security.aces.mybatis.handle.AcesIndexHandle},
#{userName, typeHandler=com.jd.security.aces.mybatis.handle.AcesPlainTextHandle}, #{userName, typeHandler=com.jd.security.aces.mybatis.handle.AcesCipherTextHandle}, #{userName, typeHandler=com.jd.security.aces.mybatis.handle.AcesIndexHandle},
#{waveCode,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{jobCode,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{signDate,jdbcType=DATE},
#{signInTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{signOutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{refPlanKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{refGridKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{refStationKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{updateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{yn,jdbcType=TINYINT},
#{ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modeType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
)
mapper.update:
update user_sign_record
org_code = #{orgCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
site_code = #{siteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER},
war_zone_code = #{warZoneCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
war_zone_name = #{warZoneName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_code = #{userCode, typeHandler=com.jd.security.aces.mybatis.handle.AcesPlainTextHandle}, user_code_encrypt = #{userCode, typeHandler=com.jd.security.aces.mybatis.handle.AcesCipherTextHandle}, user_code_index = #{userCode, typeHandler=com.jd.security.aces.mybatis.handle.AcesIndexHandle},
user_name = #{userName, typeHandler=com.jd.security.aces.mybatis.handle.AcesPlainTextHandle}, user_name_encrypt = #{userName, typeHandler=com.jd.security.aces.mybatis.handle.AcesCipherTextHandle}, user_name_index = #{userName, typeHandler=com.jd.security.aces.mybatis.handle.AcesIndexHandle},
wave_code = #{waveCode,jdbcType=TINYINT},
job_code = #{jobCode,jdbcType=TINYINT},
sign_date = #{signDate,jdbcType=DATE},
sign_in_time = #{signInTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
sign_out_time = #{signOutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ref_plan_key = #{refPlanKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ref_grid_key = #{refGridKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ref_station_key = #{refStationKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_user_name = #{updateUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
yn = #{yn,jdbcType=TINYINT},
ts = #{ts,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
mode_type = #{modeType,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update user_sign_record set
update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
yn = 0 where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select:
select count(1) from (select t.* from user_sign_record t force index(`idx_sign_date`)
) r
mapper.sql: left outer join work_station s on r.ref_station_key = s.business_key and s.yn = 1 left outer join work_station_grid g on r.ref_grid_key = g.business_key and g.yn = 1 left outer join work_station_attend_plan p on r.ref_grid_key = p.ref_grid_key and r.wave_code = p.wave_code and p.yn = 1
mapper.select:
select r.sign_date,r.wave_code,g.org_code,g.org_name,g.site_code,g.site_name, g.floor,g.grid_no,g.grid_code,g.grid_name, s.area_code,s.area_name,s.work_code,s.work_name, p.plan_name, g.standard_num, case when p.plan_attend_num is not null then p.plan_attend_num else 0 end plan_attend_num, r.attend_num, case when r2.now_attend_num is not null then r2.now_attend_num else 0 end now_attend_num from (select t.sign_date,t.ref_grid_key,t.wave_code,max(t.ref_plan_key) ref_plan_key,max(t.ref_station_key) ref_station_key,
count(distinct t.user_code) attend_num
count(distinct t.user_code_index) attend_num
from user_sign_record t force index(`idx_sign_date`)
group by t.sign_date,t.ref_grid_key,t.wave_code) r
order by r.sign_date,r.ref_grid_key,r.wave_code
limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select count(1) from (select t.sign_date,t.ref_grid_key,t.wave_code,max(t.ref_plan_key) ref_plan_key,max(t.ref_station_key) ref_station_key from user_sign_record t force index(`idx_sign_date`)
group by t.sign_date,t.ref_grid_key,t.wave_code) r
mapper.sql:
left outer join ( select t.ref_grid_key, t.wave_code,
count(distinct t.user_code) now_attend_num
count(distinct t.user_code_index) now_attend_num
from user_sign_record t force index(`idx_sign_in_time`)
group by t.ref_grid_key,t.wave_code ) r2 on r.ref_grid_key = r2.ref_grid_key and r.wave_code = r2.wave_code
mapper.select:
select sum(case when g.standard_num is null then 0 else g.standard_num end) standard_num_sum, count(distinct r.ref_grid_key) grid_count, count(distinct r.ref_station_key) station_count, count(distinct s.area_code) area_count from (select t.ref_grid_key,max(t.ref_station_key) ref_station_key from user_sign_record t force index(`idx_sign_date`)
group by t.ref_grid_key) r left outer join work_station_grid g on r.ref_grid_key = g.business_key and g.yn = 1 left outer join work_station s on r.ref_station_key = s.business_key and s.yn = 1

select r.wave_code, sum(case when p.plan_attend_num is null then 0 else p.plan_attend_num end) plan_attend_num_sum, sum(case when r.attend_num is null then 0 else r.attend_num end) attend_num_sum from (select t.ref_grid_key,t.wave_code,count(distinct t.user_code) attend_num from user_sign_record t force index(`idx_sign_date`)
group by t.ref_grid_key,t.wave_code) r left outer join work_station_attend_plan p on r.ref_grid_key = p.ref_grid_key and r.wave_code = p.wave_code and p.yn = 1 group by r.wave_code order by r.wave_code

select r.wave_code, r.job_code, sum(case when r.attend_num is null then 0 else r.attend_num end) attend_num_sum from (select t.ref_grid_key,t.wave_code,t.job_code,count(distinct t.user_code) attend_num from user_sign_record t force index(`idx_sign_date`)
group by t.ref_grid_key,t.wave_code,t.job_code) r group by r.wave_code,r.job_code order by r.wave_code,r.job_code
SELECT id FROM user_sign_record WHERE yn = 1 AND sign_in_time < #{signInTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} AND sign_out_time IS NULL LIMIT #{limit,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.update:
UPDATE user_sign_record SET update_time = #{param.updateTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_user = #{param.updateUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user_name = #{param.updateUserName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sign_out_time = #{param.signOutTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} WHERE yn = 1 AND id IN
#{item, jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select count(1) from user_sign_record t

select
from user_sign_record r where r.yn = 1 and r.ref_grid_key = #{refGridKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and r.sign_out_time is null order by id

select
from user_sign_record r
force index(`idx_site_and_create_user_code`)
force index(`idx_site_and_create_user_code_index`)
order by id desc limit #{offset}, #{limit}

select count(1) from user_sign_record r
force index(`idx_site_and_create_user_code`)
force index(`idx_site_and_create_user_code_index`)
